get.summary: Get Case Assignments in My Organisation

400.description: case_ids must be a non-empty list of proper case ids.

examples.application/json: {"message": "case_ids must be a non-empty list of proper case ids", "status": "BAD_REQUEST" }

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

201.description: Role from the organisation policy successfully assigned to the assignee.

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1) Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number
2) Case ID has to be 16-digits long
3) Case ID can not be empty
4) Case type ID can not be empty
5) IDAM Assignee ID can not be empty
6) Intended assignee has to be in the same organisation as that of the invoker.
7) Case ID has to be one for which a case role is represented by the invoker's organisation.
8) Intended assignee has to be a solicitor enabled in the jurisdiction of the case.

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1) Requested Unassignments can not be empty
2) Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number
3) Case ID has to be 16-digits long
4) Case ID can not be empty
5) IDAM Assignee ID can not be empty
6) Case role name format is invalid
7) Intended user to be unassigned has to be in the same organisation as that of the invoker.

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1) Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number
2) Case ID list is empty
3) User ID is not valid

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

403.description:
One of the following reasons:
1) Access to other user's case role assignments not granted
2) Unauthorised S2S service.

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1. Case user roles list is empty, 
2. Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number: has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number, 
3. User ID is not valid: has to be a string of length > 0, 
4. Case role name format is invalid: has to be a none-empty string in square brackets, 
5. Organisation ID is not valid: has to be a non-empty string, when present.

post.description:
Use to apply a Notice of Change decision on a case.

Note that this operation acts as a callback and therefore it accepts a standard callback request, and similarly returns a standard callback response. As with normal callbacks, the response returns a 200 (success) status when valid parameters have been passed to the operation but processing errors have occurred.

200.description:
Notice of Change decision applied successfully, or one of the following error conditions:
- A decision has not yet been made on the pending Notice of Change request
- Approval status is not recognised
- Case must contain exactly one OrganisationPolicy with the case role
- ChangeOrganisationRequest complex type is missing an expected field or value

Note that the response will contain *either* `data` (for a success) or `errors` (for an error).

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
- Request payload does not match the expected format

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

post.summary: Check for Notice of Change Approval
post.description: Check for Notice of Change Approval

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1) Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number
2) Case ID has to be 16-digits long
3) Case ID can not be empty
4) ChangeOrganisationRequest field could not be found or appears invalid
5) NoC Decision event could not be identified

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

200.description: Data with a list of Case Roles attached to the ChangeOrganisationRequest.

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1) Jurisdiction cannot be blank.
2) Case type ID can not be empty
3) No OrganisationPolicy found on the case data.
4) Ongoing NoC request in progress
5) The organisation of the solicitor is not recorded in an organisation policy on the case.
6) No Organisation id present in any Org policy on the case.
7) Missing OrganisationPolicy.OrgPolicyCaseAssignedRole %s in the case definition.
8) CaseRole field within ChangeOrganisationRequest matched none or more than one OrganisationPolicy on the case
9) ChangeOrganisationRequest field could not be found or appears invalid

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1. Case ID can not be empty, 
2. Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number, 
3. No NoC events available for this case type, 
4. Multiple NoC Request events found for the user, 
5. More than one change request found on the case, 
6. Ongoing NoC request in progress 
7. Insufficient privileges for notice of change request 
8. No Organisation Policy for one or more of the roles available for the notice of change request

examples.application/json: {"message": "Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number", "code": "case-id-invalid", "status": "BAD_REQUEST" }

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

201.description: The Notice of Change request has been successfully submitted.

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:- Any of the `400` errors returned by the `Verify Notice of Change answers` operation

1) Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number
2) Case ID has to be 16-digits long
3) Case ID can not be empty
4) Challenge question answers can not be empty
5) Missing ChangeOrganisationRequest.CaseRoleID [APPLICANT] in the case definition

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1) Case ID has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number
2) Case ID has to be 16-digits long
3) Case ID can not be empty
4) ChangeOrganisationRequest field could not be found or appears invalid
5) CaseRole field within ChangeOrganisationRequest matched none or more than one OrganisationPolicy on the case

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

post.description: Use to validate the answers provided by a user wishing to raise a Notice of Change Request to gain access to a case

200.description: Notice of Change answers verified successfully.

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
- Any of the `400` errors returned by the `Get Notice of Change questions` operation
- Challenge question answers can not be empty 
- The number of provided answers must match the number of questions - expected %s answers, received %s
- The answers did not match those for any litigant 
- The answers did not uniquely identify a litigant 
- No answer has been provided for question ID '%s' 
- No OrganisationPolicy exists on the case for the case role '%s' 
- The requestor has answered questions uniquely identifying a litigant that they are already representing

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

data.description: Case data as defined in case type definition. See `docs/api/case-data.md` for data structure.

data_classification.description: Same structure as `data` with classification (`PUBLIC`, `PRIVATE`, `RESTRICTED`) as field's value.
